message.content:
Dear [Boss' Name],

I regret to inform you that I have decided to leave [Company Name] and pursue other opportunities. My last day will be [date].

I appreciate the experiences and learning opportunities I've had while working here. It's been a challenging yet rewarding journey, and I'm grateful for the support and guidance you've provided.

Please let me know if there's anything I can do to make this transition easier for both of us. I wish you and [Company Name] all the best in the future.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
